text: Happiness is the thirteenth studio album by electronic music musician Kid606, released in 2013 through Tigerbeat6. On the vinyl version of the album, "Tarsier Treehouse" is placed after "If I Am Only Allowed One Song On This Album With Cut Up Female Vocals Then This Song Is It". ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Miguel De Pedro - Music, production *Sarah Zoraya - Design (Credited as SarahZoraya.com) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2013 albums Category:Kid606 albums Category:Tigerbeat6 albums
title: Happiness (Kid606 album)
